category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_program_project_differentiator
preference.preference_description: Enables users to differentiate between Programs and Projects visually by prepending an extra character to the project id. Users will not be able to use the character given in the value in the project id or project name. If preference does not exist or does not have any value there will not be any visual differentiation. Valid values are: * Any single character
